channel.title: [Q] About Smithing
channel.description:
I have created a new ore + bar. I have also made the ore smeltable into a bar.
I have added the bar id into Formulae.java so that I have the ability to use the bar with the anvil, etc.
When I use the bar on the anvil, I get all the options to create the item out of that bar. However, when I click the option to create a new "hatchet" for example, it says "nothing interesting happens".
I have got the new hatchet ID in the smithingdef.xml and i've been looking through other java files and can't seem to find how to fix it.
Any help pointing me in the right direction is muchly appreciated.
Thanks in advance ^^
Source: EasyRSC v1.1[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 17, 2009, 05:03:27 am[/size][hr]Many apology for this -_-;
After I had made the post, I had an insight to what the problem may be. I then went and took a look and I have figured out what the problem was and fixed it.
Sorry for any inconvenience caused. You may delete/lock this topic.
^If anyone else would like assistance regarding smithing, please don't hesitate to contact me via PM.
Regards,
Yong-Min

item.title: [Q] About Smithing
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

I didn’t put all items that are smithable under my new smithing table in the smithingdef.xml thing ^^

I only had in 3 items, but you need to have them all in from dagger - arrowheads.

Read full topic

item.title: [Q] About Smithing
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

You should at least post the fix for future reference

Read full topic
